title: The Gift of The Wagadu Chronicles with Allan Cudicio
itunes:title: The Gift of The Wagadu Chronicles with Allan Cudicio
description:
Allan Cudicio, the creator of The Wagadu Chronicles, an incredible new afrofantasy setting for D&D 5e, joins us to discuss the inspiration behind the Wagadu setting, some of his favourite creations, and of course, a tale from the Wagadu table.


Follow Allan: @AllanCudicio

Follow all things Wagadu: @WagaduChronicle


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
